tags.name: POST Method
tags.description: Create meal plans based on user preferences

parameters.name: min
parameters.description: Minimum value for the selected field

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Maximum value for the selected field

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: Which time field to filter on

parameters.name: min
parameters.description: Minimum value for the selected field

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Maximum value for the selected field

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: Which numeric field to filter on

days.description: Number of days for the meal plan

exclude_ingredients.description: Ingredients to exclude from the meal plan

parameters.name: includeIngredients
parameters.description: Select one or more ingredients to include

parameters.name: excludeIngredients
parameters.description: Select one or more ingredients to exclude

parameters.name: includeCategories
parameters.description: Select one or more categories to include

parameters.name: excludeCategories
parameters.description: Select one or more categories to exclude

Authorization.name: Authorization
Authorization.description:
To access the API, provide a valid JWT token in the 'Authorization' header. The 'Bearer' prefix is automatically added, so you only need to enter the token itself. The token is generated by the API.

Example value: <API_KEY>
